allegationDescription: Dr. Sunita Khambra was accused of failing to comply with a direction from the GMC to undergo a Performance Assessment, which was necessary due to concerns about her competencies in independent consultant practice in anaesthesia.

name: Dr Pinchas David COMISKY
allegationDescription: Dr. Pinchas Comisky was accused of failing to obtain an adequate medical history and dishonestly approving a letter confirming a patient was fit to return to work without sufficient assessment.

name: Dr Olusegun OLUJIDE
allegationDescription: Dr Olusegun Olujide was accused of performing a sterilisation procedure on a patient without consent and without clinical justification during a caesarean section, as well as failing to communicate this to the patient and her partner.

name: Dr Abeer MURSI
allegationDescription: Dr. Abeer Mursi was accused of submitting plagiarised material in an article and providing false declarations in an application for specialty training, which constituted misconduct and dishonesty.

name: Dr Fakher GENDY
allegationDescription: Dr Fakher Gendy was accused of carrying out a surgical procedure without being registered to do so, specifically a labiaplasty, which resulted in a criminal conviction.

name: Dr Mahdi ALJALLABI
allegationDescription: Dr Mahdi Aljallabi was accused of submitting a plagiarised article and providing false declarations in an application for medical training, which he admitted constituted dishonesty.

name: Dr Michael GOODWIN
allegationDescription: Dr. Michael Goodwin was accused of inappropriately self-administering a controlled substance while working as a consultant anaesthetist and dishonestly entering inaccurate information on the controlled drugs register to conceal his use of the substance.

name: Dr Cian HUGHES
allegationDescription: Dr. Cian Hughes was accused of pursuing an improper emotional and sexual relationship with a minor patient, which included sending inappropriate messages and engaging in sexual activities.

name: Dr Johnathan SAUNDERS
allegationDescription: Dr Johnathan Saunders was accused of misconduct related to practicing dentistry without registration, performing an inadequate cosmetic procedure, and subsequently harassing a patient to conceal his actions.

name: Dr Satnam LIDDER
allegationDescription: Dr. Satnam Lidder was accused of making offensive and homophobic comments to a colleague, Dr. A, and of providing false information to the Royal College of Physicians in an attempt to discredit Dr. A after the latter raised concerns about Lidder's behavior.

name: Dr Callum METCALFE
allegationDescription: Dr. Callum Metcalfe was accused of misconduct related to dishonestly obtaining medication by presenting a false prescription and was also convicted of being in charge of a vehicle while under the influence of alcohol.

name: Dr David ADAMS
allegationDescription: Dr. David Adams was accused of serious misconduct for failing to declare a criminal conviction for drink driving during his application to restore his medical registration and for providing dishonest answers related to this conviction.

name: Dr Mark O'FLYNN
allegationDescription: Dr. Mark O'Flynn was accused of misconduct related to his failure to provide necessary documentation and evidence for his case during the tribunal proceedings.

name: Dr Mohammad SOHAIL
allegationDescription: Dr Mohammad Sohail was accused of acting dishonestly regarding the care he provided to a patient and failing to disclose his regulatory history in a job application, as well as sending malicious and racially offensive communications to a woman he met online.

name: Dr Kevin NEWLEY
allegationDescription: Dr. Kevin Newley was accused of failing to provide good care to patients, including communication failures, poor record keeping, and not sharing information with colleagues.

name: Dr Anatta NERGUI
allegationDescription: Dr Anatta Nergui was accused of engaging in a course of conduct that caused fear or alarm and resisting police officers, which included harassment and sending numerous alarming communications to an individual.

name: Dr Bobby SHABBIR
allegationDescription: Dr Bobby Shabbir was accused of dishonestly answering questions on his GMC registration application regarding his fitness to practice, specifically failing to disclose his previous suspension as a solicitor due to disciplinary action.

name: Dr Mohammad MOHAMMAD
allegationDescription: Dr Mohammad was accused of providing inadequate care to two patients, leading to a misdiagnosis of ectopic pregnancy for Patient A and the misinterpretation of fetal monitoring for Patient B, resulting in a tragic outcome.

name: Dr Saadia Kamran RAO
allegationDescription: Dr. Saadia Kamran Rao was accused of engaging in dishonest conduct during the treatment of a patient, including providing false information about the volume of cerebrospinal fluid aspirated and altering medical records.

name: Mr Karl HATTOTUWA
allegationDescription: Mr. Hattotuwa was accused of failing to provide adequate clinical care to 14 patients, which included issues related to supervision, record keeping, advice, informed consent, and communication, as well as being dishonest in completing a funding request form for a procedure.

name: Dr Keyur BUCH
allegationDescription: Dr Keyur Buch was accused of posting inappropriate comments on social media that demonstrated and encouraged racial and religious hostility, particularly against Islam and the Pakistani race.

name: Dr Simon MORAN
allegationDescription: Dr. Simon Moran was accused of dishonestly prescribing medications to himself and a person with whom he had a close personal relationship, using a prescription pad that did not belong to him.

name: Dr Mujtaba GHAUS
allegationDescription: Dr Mujtaba GHAUS was accused of misconduct.

name: Dr Thangavelu SENTHIL KUMAR
allegationDescription: Dr Thangavelu SENTHIL KUMAR was involved in a costs application hearing before the tribunal.

name: Dr Ahmed ABDELRAHMAN
allegationDescription: Dr Ahmed Abdelrahman was accused of engaging in unwanted sexual conduct towards a colleague, including inappropriate physical contact and sexual harassment.

name: Dr Aftab GILL
allegationDescription: Dr Aftab Gill was accused of working without a valid medical license and providing falsified documentation regarding the status of his license to his employer.

name: Dr Elliot WELLS
allegationDescription: No determination available

name: Dr James ALLISON
allegationDescription: Dr. James Allison was accused of completing a Firearms Licensing Medical Information Proforma with untrue statements and inappropriately using the practice stamp when he was not acting as a GP.

name: Dr Kapila Shankapani BENARAGAMA
allegationDescription: Dr Kapila Shankapani Benaragama was accused of inappropriate conduct towards a colleague, including sexual harassment and abuse of his senior position.

name: Dr Samuel JOHNSON
allegationDescription: Dr Samuel Johnson was accused of dishonestly creating a false workplace-based assessment in another doctor's name and attempting to cover up his actions by impersonating that doctor.

name: Dr Thangavelu SENTHIL KUMAR
allegationDescription: Dr Thangavelu Senthil Kumar was accused of dishonestly presenting himself as another doctor online to gain access to a private group for medical professionals during the Covid-19 pandemic.

name: Dr Khaled ABDEL AZIZ
allegationDescription: Dr Khaled Abdel Aziz was accused of touching a minor, Miss A, without her consent at the Reading Festival, with allegations that his actions were sexually motivated.

name: Dr Mohamed RAMADAN
allegationDescription: Dr Mohamed Ramadan was accused of pursuing a sexual and improper emotional relationship with a vulnerable patient and inappropriately accessing the patient's medical records.

name: Dr Jane HORNSEY
allegationDescription: Dr Jane Hornsey was accused of having her fitness to practice impaired due to a conviction for driving a motor vehicle after consuming alcohol exceeding the prescribed limit.

name: Dr Lawrence ARMSTRONG
allegationDescription: Dr. Lawrence Armstrong was accused of burglary and possession of a controlled drug, having targeted his former workplace to steal controlled substances.

name: Dr Michael ISIMA
allegationDescription: Dr. Michael Isima was accused of non-compliance with a performance assessment following concerns about his clinical performance, including poor communication skills and a serious incident resulting in a neonatal death.

name: Dr Nathaniel KNOX CARTWRIGHT
allegationDescription: Dr Nathaniel Knox Cartwright was accused of consuming alcohol while on call, impairing his ability to perform surgery and provide safe patient care.

name: Dr Babatunde ARANMOLATE
allegationDescription: Dr. Babatunde Aranmolate was accused of removing medications from Hillingdon Hospitals NHS Trust without entitlement and providing them to a non-patient, while also attempting to solicit false statements from colleagues regarding the incident.

name: Dr Siong LEE
allegationDescription: Dr. Siong Lee was accused of making false entries in a patient's medical records and providing misleading information in a letter regarding the patient's care and treatment, despite the patient having raised concerns about the care received.

name: Dr Shah ALI
allegationDescription: Dr Shah Ali was accused of dishonesty for providing false information on a Disclosure and Barring Service Declaration Form regarding his fitness to practice investigation related to a dangerous driving conviction.

name: Dr Joel DANJUMA
allegationDescription: Dr. Joel Danjuma was accused of inappropriately touching Patient A during examinations, with allegations of sexual motivation behind his actions.

name: Dr Manoj NARAYAN
allegationDescription: Dr Manoj Narayan was accused of making sexually motivated comments and engaging in physical contact with a colleague, which constituted harassment on the grounds of gender and sexual orientation.

name: Dr Sotirios FOUTSIZOGLOU
allegationDescription: Dr Sotirios Foutsizoglou was accused of dishonestly claiming authorship of several research documents and falsely stating that he had obtained a PhD from Harvard in his job applications.

name: Dr Christopher STEER
allegationDescription: Dr Christopher Steer was accused of engaging in a sexual relationship with a patient while she remained under his care and failing to declare an ongoing GMC investigation on an appraisal form.

name: Mr Ghulam MALIK
allegationDescription: Mr. Ghulam Malik was accused of serious misconduct due to his persistent and repeated unsubstantiated grievances against colleagues, which undermined effective working relationships and brought the profession into disrepute.

name: Dr Kelechi OPARA
allegationDescription: Dr Kelechi Opara was accused of dishonestly submitting time sheets for shifts he did not work, thereby defrauding the NHS.

name: Dr Omoaga MUNIS
allegationDescription: Dr Omoaga Munis was accused of submitting fraudulent identity documents to gain employment as a doctor, which led to her conviction for possession of identity documents with intent.

name: Dr Adele RITCHIE
allegationDescription: Dr. Adele Ritchie was accused of having unacceptable professional performance in areas including maintaining professional performance, assessment of patients' condition, clinical management, and record-keeping.

name: Dr Edward FINN
allegationDescription: Dr Edward Finn was accused of multiple serious offenses including taking and making indecent photographs of children, voyeurism, and assaulting a girl under 13 by touching, leading to his conviction and sentencing.

name: Dr Sarah ALAM
allegationDescription: No determination available

name: Dr Muhammad Asad HAROON
allegationDescription: Dr Muhammad Asad Haroon was accused of controlling or coercive behaviour in an intimate or family relationship, leading to his conviction at Swansea Crown Court.

name: Dr Amitabh KUMAR
allegationDescription: Dr Amitabh Kumar was accused of sexual assault against a minor and failing to notify the General Medical Council of his conviction.

name: Dr Thabo MILLER
allegationDescription: Dr. Thabo Miller was accused of assaulting Ms. A, which included using offensive language, attempting to damage her car, and physically assaulting her, resulting in a conviction for assault by beating.

name: Dr Ahmed ELSHAFEY
allegationDescription: Dr Ahmed Elshafey was accused of making inappropriate remarks and engaging in unprofessional conduct towards female patients, including complimenting their appearance and inappropriately touching them.

name: Dr Shehzada NAZIR
allegationDescription: Dr Shehzada Nazir was accused of misconduct for failing to adequately assess a patient during a consultation, making inappropriate comments, and not taking necessary actions to ensure the patient's safety, including failing to record the patient's suicidal thoughts.

name: Dr Bervin TEO CHONG WEI
allegationDescription: Dr Bervin Teo Chong Wei was accused of dishonestly presenting himself as a consultant at a hospital to obtain a blood sample, despite knowing he was no longer employed there and lacked permission to access the hospital's computer system.

name: Dr Gamal MOHAMED
allegationDescription: Dr Gamal Mohamed was accused of deficient professional performance, specifically regarding his clinical capabilities and management of patient care.

name: Dr Andrew THILLAINAYAGAM
allegationDescription: Dr Andrew Thillainayagam was accused of failing to adequately assess a patient during their hospital admission and of maintaining inadequate record keeping regarding the patient's care, which contributed to the patient's deterioration and subsequent death.

name: Dr John MCCLELLAND
area: North Tyneside, Mid and East Antrim
allegationDescription: Dr. John McClelland was accused of serious misconduct involving dishonesty related to fraudulent prescription practices and a conviction for making false representations.

name: Dr Thomas HERBST
allegationDescription: Dr. Thomas Herbst was accused of attending work while unfit, having fallen asleep during a procedure where he was responsible for an anaesthetised patient, and exhibiting incoherent behavior.

name: Dr Herjyot DHARNI
allegationDescription: Dr Herjyot DharnI was accused of failing to disclose her work to the GMC and Health Education England, providing false information in her application for a training program, and leaving a shift early without informing colleagues, which resulted in a lack of support for a junior doctor.

name: Dr Muhammad MALIK
allegationDescription: Dr Muhammad Malik was accused of submitting falsified Patient Feedback Questionnaires as part of his revalidation process, which he admitted was dishonest.

name: Dr Richard BOWLEY
allegationDescription: Dr. Richard Bowley was accused of accessing and viewing the medical records of a patient, who was also a professional colleague, without permission and without legitimate justification.

name: Dr Srinivasa Rao KUNA
allegationDescription: Dr Srinivasa Rao Kuna was accused of dishonestly recording his role as 'surgeon' in a Training Log during a performance review, knowing that these entries were false.

name: Dr Lorraine HUTCHINSON-GALE
allegationDescription: Dr Lorraine Hutchinson-Gale was accused of undertaking simultaneous shifts for two different healthcare providers, HUC and PPG, knowing that she should not have done so, which was alleged to be dishonest conduct.

name: Dr Alexandra KENNARD
allegationDescription: Dr Alexandra Kennard was accused of failing to disclose a criminal conviction for driving under the influence of alcohol and possessing a prohibited weapon, as well as making dishonest statements regarding her driving status.

name: Dr Mili SHAH
allegationDescription: Dr Mili Shah was accused of failing to provide good clinical care to patients and making an antisemitic comment that constituted harassment.

name: Dr Dharmesh SHAH
allegationDescription: Dr. Dharmesh Shah was accused of serious misconduct related to inappropriate breast examinations and failure to obtain consent from patients, as well as not maintaining adequate clinical records.

name: Dr George ZENG
allegationDescription: Dr. George Zeng was accused of voyeurism for recording a private act without consent, which constituted a criminal offense under the Sexual Offences Act 2003.

name: Dr Isaac BAIDOO
allegationDescription: Dr. Isaac Baidoo was accused of submitting false sick notes and working while on sick leave, which constituted dishonesty and misconduct.

name: Dr Paul JACKSON
allegationDescription: Dr. Paul Jackson was accused of having an unacceptable professional performance in the domain of 'Maintaining Professional Performance' following a General Medical Council assessment.

name: Dr Daman SHARMA
allegationDescription: Dr. Daman Sharma was accused of multiple incidents of sexual misconduct and harassment towards eight female colleagues and two patients, as well as dishonesty regarding allegations made against him.

name: Dr Maxwell DUGBOYELE
allegationDescription: Dr Maxwell Dugboyele was accused of persistent sexual harassment at work towards junior, female colleagues, which included an abuse of professional position and unlawful sexual harassment.

name: Dr Thirumurugan SUNDARESAN
allegationDescription: Dr Thirumurugan Sundaresan was accused of dishonestly making false representations regarding patient records and instructing others to create misleading entries in the EMIS system, which led to his conviction for fraud.

name: Dr Faisal PATEL
allegationDescription: Dr Faisal Patel was accused of making dishonest amendments to a patient's medical records to avoid criticism of his care, specifically failing to indicate that the amendments were made retrospectively.

name: Dr Astrit RRUKAJ
allegationDescription: Dr Astrit Rrukaj was accused of behaving inappropriately towards a colleague, Ms A, including multiple sexual advances without her consent during an encounter on 13 August 2021.

name: Dr Kausik RAY
allegationDescription: Dr Kausik Ray was accused of sexual assault after inappropriately touching a female colleague without her consent during a consultation at the hospital where he worked.

name: Dr Sachin MANORAJ
allegationDescription: Dr Sachin Manoraj was accused of dishonesty for failing to disclose ongoing police investigations and two criminal convictions on application forms during his medical training.

name: Dr Osman HAJAHMED
allegationDescription: Dr Osman Hajahmed was accused of causing Actual Bodily Harm to Ms A by striking her with a stick multiple times.

name: Dr Thangavelu SENTHIL KUMAR
allegationDescription: Dr Thangavelu Senthil Kumar was accused of dishonestly presenting himself as another doctor online to gain access to a private group for medical professionals during the Covid-19 pandemic.

name: Dr George Akinkunle LAWSON
allegationDescription: Dr George Akinkunle Lawson was accused of multiple counts of assault and behaving in a threatening or abusive manner, resulting in criminal convictions.

name: Dr Mouhammad SULTAN
allegationDescription: Dr Mouhammad Sultan was accused of dishonestly failing to disclose his undertakings with the GMC while working at a hospital, and for not completing a required work details form despite multiple requests.

name: Dr Peter WILCOCK
allegationDescription: Dr. Peter Wilcock was involved in a tribunal regarding a new conviction or caution.

name: Dr Eno UMOTONG
allegationDescription: Dr Eno Umotong was accused of driving while disqualified, exceeding the speed limit, failing to stop at a red traffic light, and providing false information to a police officer.

name: Dr Samuel OJO
allegationDescription: Dr Samuel OJO was accused of smoking cannabis while on shift at a hospital, while caring for vulnerable mental health patients.

name: Dr Varaha Vijaya Nageswara KONATHALA
allegationDescription: No determination available

name: Dr Chikaodinaka OKOLO
allegationDescription: Dr Chikaodinaka Okolo was accused of misconduct related to self-prescribing, issuing fraudulent prescriptions, and receiving a police caution for possession of a Class A drug.

name: Dr Touseef SAFDAR
allegationDescription: Dr Touseef Safdar was accused of being dishonest in written and oral evidence provided during court proceedings, specifically regarding the inclusion of false information in a witness statement.

name: Dr Odunayo ODEWOLE
allegationDescription: Dr. Odunayo Odewole was accused of failing to notify the GMC of his criminal convictions and dishonestly declaring that he had no convictions when applying for a position with NES Healthcare.

name: Dr Sameed ZAHID
allegationDescription: Dr Sameed Zahid was accused of submitting false information and documents regarding his post-graduate internship in China when applying for full registration with the GMC, knowing that these claims were untrue.

name: Dr Ijaz HAYAT
allegationDescription: Dr Ijaz Hayat was accused of dishonestly making fraudulent claims on his critical illness and travel insurance, including providing misleading information regarding his health history.

name: Dr Kristan Jotin VEDI
allegationDescription: Dr Kristan Jotin Vedi was accused of forming an inappropriate personal relationship with a vulnerable former patient, which included giving her money, sending inappropriate messages, and sharing inappropriate images via social media.

name: Dr Yogesh PARASHAR
area: Sunderland, County Durham, Swindon, Newcastle upon Tyne
allegationDescription: Dr Yogesh Parashar was accused of consulting with patients while under the influence of alcohol, failing to provide adequate care and treatment, and engaging in sexually motivated harassment towards a staff member.

name: Dr Ali SHOKOUH-AMIRI
allegationDescription: Dr. Ali Shokouh-Amiri was accused of inappropriate behavior and substandard clinical care towards multiple patients, including sexual misconduct and dishonesty in medical documentation.

name: Dr Lina SIMAVICIUTE
allegationDescription: Dr Lina Simaviciute was accused of failing to comply with a GMC-directed Performance Assessment, which raised concerns about her clinical knowledge, skills, and communication abilities.

name: Dr Ioannis TOSOUNIDIS
allegationDescription: Dr Ioannis Tosounidis was accused of deficient professional performance and misconduct, including misleading and dishonest actions related to pathology reports and job applications.

name: Dr Syed Majid Hussain ZAIDI
allegationDescription: Dr Syed Majid Hussain ZAIDI was accused of misconduct and impairment related to his professional conduct.

name: Dr Mona HOSNY Doctor  tribunal hearing record
allegationSummary:
The tribunal found that, having agreed in January 2022 to a voluntary restriction to not work in patient facing duties whilst subject to a Maintaining High Professional Standards investigation at Nottingham University Hospitals NHS Trust (‘NUH’), Dr Hosny worked at other Trusts between 4 February and 26 May 2022 without informing the Trusts, locum agencies or NUH that she was undertaking the work. It found that her actions were dishonest.

name: Dr Matthew WHITE Doctor  tribunal hearing record
allegationSummary: The tribunal found that, between April and July 2021, Dr White completed shifts at the North West London NHS Foundation Trust but, in May and June 2021, he informed the GMC that he was not currently working and that he would find a job later in the year. It also found that the information he provided to the GMC was false, his actions were dishonest and that Dr White failed to co-operate with the GMC’s investigation in that he did not provide a Work Details Form.
